languages.text: Благословенные реликвии вселили в души пустотников столь много веры, что в них не осталось места ни страху, ни сомнениям. Пускай победа над врагом далась невероятным множеством погибших — эта жертва не была напрасной.

Blessed relics instilled the souls of the voidsmen with such faith that there was no room for fear or doubt. It may have taken a staggering number of casualties to prevail over the enemy, but their sacrifice was not in vain.
languages.original_text: Благословенные реликвии вселили в души пустотников столь много веры, что в них не осталось места ни страху, ни сомнениям. Пускай победа над врагом далась невероятным множеством погибших — эта жертва не была напрасной.

traits.locale_text: Blessed relics instilled the souls of the voidborn with such faith that there was no room for fear or doubt. It may have taken a staggering number of casualties to prevail over the enemy, but those people's sacrifice was not in vain.

Blessed relics instilled the souls of the voidborn with such faith that there was no room for fear or doubt. It may have taken a staggering number of casualties to prevail over the enemy, but those people's sacrifice was not in vain.

Blessed relics instilled the souls of the voidsmen with such faith that there was no room for fear or doubt. It may have taken a staggering number of casualties to prevail over the enemy, but their sacrifice was not in vain.

Blessed relics instilled the souls of the voidsmen with such faith that there was no room for fear or doubt. It may have taken a staggering number of casualties to prevail over the enemy, but their sacrifice was not in vain.

languages.text: 受祝福的圣物让船员的心中充满了无所畏惧的坚定信仰。或许他们为了战胜敌人付出了惨重的伤亡，但这样的牺牲绝非白费。
languages.original_text: Blessed relics instilled the souls of the voidsmen with such faith that there was no room for fear or doubt. It may have taken a staggering number of casualties to prevail over the enemy, but their sacrifice was not in vain.

traits.locale_text: 受祝福的圣物让船员的心中充满了无所畏惧的坚定信仰。或许他们为了战胜敌人付出了惨重的伤亡，但这样的牺牲绝非白费。

languages.text: Las reliquias bendecidas infundieron tal fe en las almas de los hombres del vacío que no había lugar para el miedo o la duda. Puede que se produjera un número abrumador de bajas para imponerse al enemigo, pero su sacrificio no fue en vano.
languages.original_text: Blessed relics instilled the souls of the voidsmen with such faith that there was no room for fear or doubt. It may have taken a staggering number of casualties to prevail over the enemy, but their sacrifice was not in vain.

traits.locale_text: Las reliquias bendecidas infundieron tal fe en las almas de los hombres del vacío que no había lugar para el miedo o la duda. Puede que se produjera un número abrumador de bajas para imponerse al enemigo, pero su sacrificio no fue en vano.

languages.text: 祝福された遺物は、恐怖心や猜疑心の隙もない忠誠心をヴォイズマンの魂に植え付けた。敵に勝つために恐ろしいほどの死傷者数を出したかもしれないが、その犠牲は無駄ではなかった。
languages.original_text: Blessed relics instilled the souls of the voidsmen with such faith that there was no room for fear or doubt. It may have taken a staggering number of casualties to prevail over the enemy, but their sacrifice was not in vain.

traits.locale_text: 祝福された遺物は、恐怖心や猜疑心の隙もない忠誠心をヴォイズマンの魂に植え付けた。敵に勝つために恐ろしいほどの死傷者数を出したかもしれないが、その犠牲は無駄ではなかった。

languages.text: La foi inébranlable que les reliques sacrées ont insufflée dans l'esprit des cosmomarins ne laisse aucune place à la peur et au doute. Malgré le nombre impressionnant de victimes, leur sacrifice n'est pas vain, l'ennemi est éradiqué.
languages.original_text: Blessed relics instilled the souls of the voidsmen with such faith that there was no room for fear or doubt. It may have taken a staggering number of casualties to prevail over the enemy, but their sacrifice was not in vain.

traits.locale_text: La foi inébranlable que les reliques sacrées ont insufflée dans l'esprit des cosmomarins ne laisse aucune place à la peur et au doute. Malgré le nombre impressionnant de victimes, leur sacrifice n'est pas vain, l'ennemi est éradiqué.

languages.text: Gesegnete Relikte erfüllten die Seelen der Raumfahrer mit solchem Glauben, dass kein Platz für Furcht oder Zweifel war. Es war zwar eine gewaltige Zahl von Todesopfern nötig, um den Feind zu bezwingen, doch ihr Opfer war nicht umsonst.
languages.original_text: Blessed relics instilled the souls of the voidsmen with such faith that there was no room for fear or doubt. It may have taken a staggering number of casualties to prevail over the enemy, but their sacrifice was not in vain.

languages.text: Kutsal emanetler, uçsuz erlerinin ruhlarına öyle bir inanç aşıladı ki korkuya ya da şüpheye yer kalmadı. Düşmanı alt etmek büyük kayıplara mal olsa da yapılan bu fedakârlık boşa gitmedi.
languages.original_text: Blessed relics instilled the souls of the voidsmen with such faith that there was no room for fear or doubt. It may have taken a staggering number of casualties to prevail over the enemy, but their sacrifice was not in vain.
